item: For an Indonesian shipping company in its capacity as a respondent in a bankruptcy proceeding at the Commercial Court in the District Court of Central Jakarta;

For an Indonesian company in an InternationalArbitration proceeding at the Kuala Lumpur Regional Centre for Arbitration (KLRCA) in relation to a dispute on a Shareholders Agreement of a joint venture company;
To a State-Owned Enterprise in Indonesia in developing its strategy for the purpose of business expansion to other countries in Southeast Asia;
to a foreign insurance company in relation to thepurchase of bonds issued under Indonesian laws and regulations governing the purchase of bonds by a company;
To a foreign company in a share acquisition transaction of another company in Indonesia;
Mendampingi perusahaan telekomunikasi yang berkantor pusat di Cina sebagai pelapor di Polda Metro Jaya
A China-based telecommunication company in its capacity as a claimant, in filing a police report to the Indonesian Regional Police of Metro Jaya;
In an arbitration proceeding at the Indonesian National Arbitration Board (Badan Arbitrase Nasional Indonesia – BANI) on an aviation safety dispute;
On a criminal proceeding of a client on appeal and cassation (kasasi);

To a mini-hydro power plant company in relation to its credit request submission to a national bank in Indonesia by analyzing the facility agreements and ensuring the completeness of the required documents in accordance with the prevailing laws and regulations;
A witness in a criminal investigation at the Regional Police level throughout Indonesia as well as the National Police level;
Shipping contracts for a palm oil plantation company;
Providing Legal Advice bagi Terdakwa dalam proses persidangan pidana
A Japanese private company as a foreign shareholder in a joint venture in the transfer of shares to a domestic shareholder, in a manpower outsourcing joint venture.
For a defendant in a criminal proceeding.

and assistance to the contractors of the double trackrailway line in the north coast of the island of Java for the purpose of carrying out Indonesia’s Acceleration and Expansion of Economic Development Master Plan (Master Plan Percepatan dan Perluasan Pembangunan Ekonomi Indonesia – MP3EI) 2011-2015;
Indonesian finance company as both a claimant and a respondent in an investigation in relation to criminal activities regarding financial leases, facility agreements and fiducia security;
